arts.ttl: Simeone talks squad balance, Griezmann role as Atlético face Las Palmas
arts.sum: Speaking after a gutting defeat to Las Palmas in injury time, Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone effectively ruled out any hopes of a title challenge with the gap opening to nine points with six games to play. Adding to that as he reflected on the game, he continued that, “the first half was quite good, but the goalkeeper didn’t allow us to take the lead.

arts.ttl: Antoine Griezmann unsure over Atletico Madrid future despite contract offer
arts.sum: Antoine Griezmann faces a crunch summer decision on his future at Atletico Madrid as the club wait on an answer. Griezmann has been widely backed to stay in Madrid for the 2025/26 season, despite previous speculation on his plans in the Spanish capital, with both sides consistently expressing their intention to extend the link for […] The post Antoine Griezmann unsure over Atletico Madrid future despite contract offer appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg rekindle interest in Wolves striker Fabio Silva
arts.sum: Sky Germany's Florian Plettenberg reports that VfL Wolfsburg are also interested in Wolverhampton Wanderers striker Fabio Silva.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa transfer news: Atletico Madrid 'circling' for midfielder, facing La Liga competition
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid are reportedly among a number of clubs who are contemplating whether to make an approach for an Aston Villa midfielder during the summer transfer window.

arts.ttl: Wolves transfer news: Atletico Madrid boss Diego Simeone heaps praise on Fabio Silva amid speculation
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid manager Diego Simeone waxes lyrical about Wolverhampton Wanderers forward Fabio Silva ahead of Saturday's La Liga game with the Portuguese's loan club Las Palmas.

Las Palmas will be hoping to build some momentum after an impressive win last time out. A 3-1 win against Getafe might not have taken them out of the relegation zone, but they're one step closer now. ...

arts.ttl: LaLiga injury news, predicted lineups, fantasy updates
arts.sum: Find out who is missing through injury and who is in a race against time to prove their fitness in Spain's LaLiga this weekend.
There is still plenty to be decided in LaLiga and Joe Champion has previewed all 10 games in the Spanish top flight in week 32.
